item.name: Power Near Overload Threshold
item.description: User-defined near power overload threshold, measured in tenths of kilowatts. Models that do not support this feature will respond to this OID with a value of -1.

item.name: Power Overload Threshold
item.description: User-defined near power overload threshold, measured in tenths of kilowatts. Models that do not support this feature will respond to this OID with a value of -1.

item.name: Max Phase Current Rating
item.description: The maximum current rating, measured in Amps, for the Rack PDU

item.name: Total Energy
item.description: A user re-settable energy meter measuring Rack PDU load energy consumption in tenths of kilowatt-hours.

item.name: Load State
item.description: Indicates the present load status of the Rack PDU.

item.name: Peak Power
item.description: The peak power consumption of the Rack PDU load in hundredths of kilowatts.

item.name: Power Consumption
item.description: The power consumption of the Rack PDU load in hundredths of kilowatts. Models that do not support this feature will respond to this OID with a value of -1.

item.name: Power Supply Alarm
item.description: Indicates a power supply alarm is active when value equals alarm (2)

item.name: Rack Inlet Humidity
item.description: The Relative Humidity entering the rack

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 1 Voltage High {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 1 voltage rises above 125V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 1 Voltage Low {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 1 voltage falls below 115V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 2 Voltage High {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 2 voltage rises above 125V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 2 Voltage Low {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 2 voltage falls below 115V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 3 Voltage High {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 3 voltage rises above 125V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU Phase 3 Voltage Low {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: If the Phase 3 voltage falls below 115V for an avg of 3 minutes

trigger.name: APC PDU {HOST.NAME} Power Near Overload
trigger.description: When Power is near overload. Set to the value predetermined by the device presets

trigger.name: APC PDU {HOST.NAME} Power Overload
trigger.description: When Power is at overload. Set to the value predetermined by the device presets
